languages.text: {n}Вы вдруг осознаете, что друкари двигается поразительно медленно — в отличие от предыдущего рывка. Его занесенная рука не стремится опускаться, и друкари разъяренно шипит:{/n} "В чем дело, {name}? Ты забыл{mf||а} свое место?!"

{n}You suddenly realise that he is moving remarkably slowly — a stark difference from his leap just moments ago. He seems in no rush to lower his raised hand, and then he hisses,{/n} "What is wrong with you, {name}? Have you forgotten your place?"
languages.original_text: {n}Вы вдруг осознаете, что друкари двигается поразительно медленно — в отличие от предыдущего рывка. Его занесенная рука не стремится опускаться, и друкари разъяренно шипит:{/n} "В чем дело, {name}? Ты забыл{mf||а} свое место?!"

traits.locale_text: {n}You suddenly realise that he is moving remarkably slowly — a stark difference from his leap just moments ago. He seems in no rush to lower his raised hand, and then he hisses,{/n} "What is wrong with you, {name}? Have you forgotten your place?"

{n}You suddenly realise that he is moving remarkably slowly — a stark difference from his leap just moments ago. He seems in no rush to lower his raised hand, and then he hisses,{/n} "What is wrong with you, {name}? Have you forgotten your place?"

{n}You suddenly realise that he is moving remarkably slowly — a stark difference from his leap just moments ago. He seems in no rush to lower his raised hand, and then he hisses,{/n} "What is wrong with you, {name}? Have you forgotten your place?"

{n}You suddenly realise that he is moving remarkably slowly — a stark difference from his leap just moments ago. He seems in no rush to lower his raised hand, and then he hisses,{/n} "What is wrong with you, {name}? Have you forgotten your place?"

languages.text: {n}你突然意识到，他的动作变得无比缓慢，与刚刚快如闪电的样子截然不同。他似乎并不急于将高高举起的手刺下来，而是低声嘶吼起来。{/n}“你到底是怎么回事，{name}？难道你忘记自己的身份了吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}You suddenly realise that he is moving remarkably slowly — a stark difference from his leap just moments ago. He seems in no rush to lower his raised hand, and then he hisses,{/n} "What is wrong with you, {name}? Have you forgotten your place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}你突然意识到，他的动作变得无比缓慢，与刚刚快如闪电的样子截然不同。他似乎并不急于将高高举起的手刺下来，而是低声嘶吼起来。{/n}“你到底是怎么回事，{name}？难道你忘记自己的身份了吗？”

languages.text: {n}突然、マラズハイが嫌にゆっくりと動いていることに気づく―つい先ほど飛び跳ねていたときとは明らかに違う。急いでないという顔で、あげた手を下げて、それからとシューッと声を漏らした。{/n}「どうした、{name}？立場を忘れたか？」
languages.original_text: {n}You suddenly realise that he is moving remarkably slowly — a stark difference from his leap just moments ago. He seems in no rush to lower his raised hand, and then he hisses,{/n} "What is wrong with you, {name}? Have you forgotten your place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}突然、マラズハイが嫌にゆっくりと動いていることに気づく―つい先ほど飛び跳ねていたときとは明らかに違う。急いでないという顔で、あげた手を下げて、それからとシューッと声を漏らした。{/n}「どうした、{name}？立場を忘れたか？」

languages.text: {n}Súbitamente comprendes que se mueve extraordinariamente despacio, en marcado contraste con el brinco que dio hace solo unos instantes. No parece tener prisa por bajar la mano, y luego sisea:{/n} «¿Qué te pasa, {name}? ¿Acaso has olvidado tu lugar?».
languages.original_text: {n}You suddenly realise that he is moving remarkably slowly — a stark difference from his leap just moments ago. He seems in no rush to lower his raised hand, and then he hisses,{/n} "What is wrong with you, {name}? Have you forgotten your place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Súbitamente comprendes que se mueve extraordinariamente despacio, en marcado contraste con el brinco que dio hace solo unos instantes. No parece tener prisa por bajar la mano, y luego sisea:{/n} «¿Qué te pasa, {name}? ¿Acaso has olvidado tu lugar?».

languages.text: {n}Vous vous apercevez subitement qu'il se meut avec une lenteur inhabituelle, en net contraste avec la vitesse à laquelle il s'est rué sur vous un instant plus tôt. Il n'a pas l'air pressé d'abaisser sa main levée et se met à siffler :{/n} « Qu'est-ce qui ne tourne pas rond chez vous, {name} ? Auriez-vous oublié votre rang ? »
languages.original_text: {n}You suddenly realise that he is moving remarkably slowly — a stark difference from his leap just moments ago. He seems in no rush to lower his raised hand, and then he hisses,{/n} "What is wrong with you, {name}? Have you forgotten your place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous apercevez subitement qu'il se meut avec une lenteur inhabituelle, en net contraste avec la vitesse à laquelle il s'est rué sur vous un instant plus tôt. Il n'a pas l'air pressé d'abaisser sa main levée et se met à siffler :{/n} « Qu'est-ce qui ne tourne pas rond chez vous, {name} ? Auriez-vous oublié votre rang ? »

languages.text: {n}Unversehens stellst du fest, dass er sich nun außergewöhnlich langsam bewegt – im krassen Gegensatz zu seinem Sprung kurz davor. Offenbar hat er es nicht eilig, seine erhobene Hand zu senken, und dann zischt er:{/n} "Was ist los mit Euch, {name}? Habt Ihr vergessen, wo Ihr hingehört?"
languages.original_text: {n}You suddenly realise that he is moving remarkably slowly — a stark difference from his leap just moments ago. He seems in no rush to lower his raised hand, and then he hisses,{/n} "What is wrong with you, {name}? Have you forgotten your place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Unversehens stellst du fest, dass er sich nun außergewöhnlich langsam bewegt – im krassen Gegensatz zu seinem Sprung kurz davor. Offenbar hat er es nicht eilig, seine erhobene Hand zu senken, und dann zischt er:{/n} "Was ist los mit Euch, {name}? Habt Ihr vergessen, wo Ihr hingehört?"

languages.text: {n}Aniden az önceki sıçrayışıyla muazzam bir fark yaratırcasına, son derece yavaş hareket ettiğini fark ediyorsun. Kaldırdığı elini indirmek için hiç acele etmiyor. Ardından tıslayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Senin derdin ne {name}? Yerini unuttun mu yoksa?"
languages.original_text: {n}You suddenly realise that he is moving remarkably slowly — a stark difference from his leap just moments ago. He seems in no rush to lower his raised hand, and then he hisses,{/n} "What is wrong with you, {name}? Have you forgotten your place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Aniden az önceki sıçrayışıyla muazzam bir fark yaratırcasına, son derece yavaş hareket ettiğini fark ediyorsun. Kaldırdığı elini indirmek için hiç acele etmiyor. Ardından tıslayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Senin derdin ne {name}? Yerini unuttun mu yoksa?"
